name: Multiplayer Splat!
description:
This is a recreation of classic ZX Spectrum game "Splat!", originally written by Ian Andrew and published by Incentive.  Move around the maze but avoid hitting the outer wall which moves around randomly.

There are 3 different game modes to try:-

  • Last man standing
  • Highest score at the end
  • Classic/Original

Up to 4 players can try and survive the maze together, but there can be only one winner!  This game recreates the whole maze from the original.
